Question: The themes were also inspired by this person and Walker's divorce, which took place in 1996.
Hints: This person first learned to play the cello as a child in North Carolina, and switched to the guitar in 1960.
This person's four siblings—Alex, Livingston, Hugh, and Kate—have also been musicians with recorded albums.
Having lost touch with his former school friends in North Carolina, this person returned to Milton for his senior year.
